summary: REQ-11 and REQ-12 are partially implemented: a new Help/Install page and /help route/link were added, and a PWA manifest plus HTML PWA meta/link tags were added. However, the diff summary does not show the required static image/icon assets being added under frontend/public, and REQ-13’s required generated images are only referenced in UI, not evidenced as present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Help / Install page must include a clear note that publishing to Apple App Store / Google Play Store requires a separate native wrapper and store submission process not performed by this web deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: The added HelpInstallPage.tsx is truncated and the shown portion includes install steps and UI, but does not show the required explicit store/wrapper disclaimer text. Cannot confirm from provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include required PWA icon assets referenced by the manifest (common sizes).
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest references /assets/pwa/icon-192x192.png and /assets/pwa/icon-512x512.png, but the diff summary does not show these files added under frontend/public (or anywhere).

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the Apple touch icon asset referenced by the HTML entry point.
missing_requirements.reason: index.html links /assets/pwa/apple-touch-icon-180x180.png, but the diff summary does not show that file being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure app-logo.dim_512x512.png exists at frontend/public/assets/generated and loads without 404s.
missing_requirements.reason: UI now references /assets/generated/app-logo.dim_512x512.png, but the diff summary does not show the PNG file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png exists at frontend/public/assets/generated and loads without 404s, and is used on the discovery page.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show the hero banner image file being added, nor does it show the DiscoveryPage change that uses that exact path (only a high-level mention in frontend-file-summaries.txt).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions DiscoveryPage hero banner, but no direct diff shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the generated feature icon sheet asset (feature-icons.dim_256x256.png) under frontend/public/assets/generated so the Help/Install page image does not 404.
missing_requirements.reason: HelpInstallPage.tsx references /assets/generated/feature-icons.dim_256x256.png, but the diff summary does not show that file being added. (This is listed under 'Images required' in the BuildRequest, even though it is not part of REQ-13’s AC list.)

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual/theme changes (new OKLCH warm palette, typography, safe-area utilities) beyond the PWA/help-install scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-11/12/13; appears as an unrelated styling overhaul per the diff summary file listing.
